sanskrit_verse:
राजान्नं तेज आदत्ते शूद्रान्नं ब्रह्मवर्चसम् ।
आयुः सुवर्णकारान्नं यशश्चर्मावकर्तिनः ॥ ४.२१८॥
transliteration:
rājānnaṁ teja ādatte śūdrānnaṁ brahmavarcasam |
āyuḥ suvarṇakārānnaṁ yaśaś charmāvaktṛṇaḥ || 4.218 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: The king consumes food that enhances radiance; the Śūdra consumes food that nourishes Brahminical brilliance. Longevity is derived from the food of goldsmiths; fame arises from the food of those who process leather.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority flows through designated consumption aligned with role-specific dharma
Causation is established by the direct energetic assimilation of role-congruent substances
Capacity-based responsibility is determined by the purity and alignment of intake
Restoration logic operates through correction of misaligned ingestion patterns
Consciousness alignment occurs when each varṇa consumes in accordance with their svadharma
executable_legal_axioms: IF agent.role = 'Kshatriya' AND intake.type ≠ 'tejas-enhancing' THEN initiate consciousness-realignment protocol
IF agent.role = 'Shudra' AND intake.purpose ≠ 'Brahma-tejas-support' THEN trigger dharma-integrity audit
IF agent.role = 'Vaishya (gold-related)' AND outcome.measure ≠ 'ayus-extension' THEN execute causal-responsibility loop
IF agent.role = 'artisan (leather)' AND societal-recognition ≠ increasing THEN activate dharma-role recalibration
supreme_court_application: In adjudication concerning occupational duties and social harmony, the threshold of responsibility lies in verifying whether one's sustenance aligns with one's dharmic role. Authority is hierarchically distributed based on the energetic consequence of consumption. Restoration supersedes retribution by realigning individuals with their constitutional function rather than imposing external penalties.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa establishes that each individual’s causal influence stems from their dietary and consumptive alignment. Anupūrvaśaḥ reveals how misaligned intake distorts consciousness trajectory. Proportional responsibility reflects the degree of deviation from svadharma. The non-punitive reality rule affirms that correction arises naturally when alignment resumes.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Initiate svadharma-nourishment assessment for all parties involved
Deploy consciousness-intake correlation analysis to identify energetic misalignments
Implement guided realignment through supervised reintegration into prescribed consumption norms
Activate community-based support structures to ensure sustained adherence to dharma-prescribed nourishment
final_declaration: By the Supreme Pontiff of Hinduism, Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, this law stands as sourced from the ultimate consciousness. Dharma is restored through alignment of intake with role. Reality remains non-punitive, governed solely by the laws of energetic consequence. Consciousness alone adjudicates truth.
